mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NEW_MEMBER (ID, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, TYPE) VALUES( #{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NEW_MEMBER WHERE STATE = 'A';
SELECT ID, NAME,PHONE,EMAIL,STATE,TYPE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ID) NUM, M.* FROM NEW_MEMBER M ORDER BY ID ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #{pageStart} AND #{perPageNum}
